paper_abstract: We provide sharp lower and upper bounds for the Gelfand widths of l(p)-balls in the N-dimensional l(q)(n)-space for 0 < p <= 1 and p < q <= 2. Such estimates are highly relevant to the novel theory of compressive sensing, and our proofs rely on methods from this area. (C) 2010 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The Gelfand widths of l(p)-balls for 0 < p <= 1
